SCENARIO 13: MBK - ACC / ACT / REP = 1-2 / 1 / 2 ; SHK / SIZ = N / S

INPUTS

GROUP 1: Room Access

#Key IdRoom NameCharacter Name
11Room 1Peter
22Room 2Paul
32Room 2Mary

GROUP 2: Room Action

#Key IdActionDone By
11EnterSteve

GROUP 3: Room Repair

#Key IdActionCompletionRepaired By
12Analyse20%Samantha
22Fix100%Brenda

OUTPUTS

GROUP 1: File room_action.log

#Line
11|Room 1|Steve|Enter

0 failed of 1: SUCCESS

GROUP 2: File room_repair.log

#Line
12|Room 2|20%|Samantha|Analyse
22|Room 2|100%|Brenda|Fix

0 failed of 2: SUCCESS

GROUP 3: Unhandled Exception: Empty as expected: SUCCESS

0 failed of 3: SUCCESS
